lead_paragraph: CAVALLARO-Anthony, 77. Retired from EBCBS, World War II veteran 82nd Airborne. Survived by wife Hannah (Gilmartin) Cavallaro, sister Ann Orsi, two nephews and four nieces. For further information, Westchester Funeral Home, (914)-337-4585.
